original_title: Jean-Michel Jarre - The Twelve Dreams Of The Sun
overview: Countdown 2000 Pyramids of Giza (Egypt).  The Twelve Dreams Of The Sun was a concert held by musician Jean Michel Jarre on the Pyramids of Giza, Egypt starting on December 31, 1999 and carrying overnight to January 1, 2000. It was attended by 120,000 people. The concert consisted of two parts, the Main Concert and a Sunrise Concer.
title: Jean-Michel Jarre - The Twelve Dreams Of The Sun
